NK040(thi)059:1: // zab don gcod kyi bsregs pa'i las mtha' dus mtha'i me chen dbu phyogs bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)059:2: skye med dbyings las 'gags med sgyu ma'i 'phrul //
NK040(thi)059:3: mi bzad gar dgu'i nyams kyi ye shes mes //
NK040(thi)059:4: bdud dpung sreg mdzad rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
NK040(thi)059:5: bla ma mchog dang dbyer med der phyag 'tshal //
NK040(thi)059:6: de yang dbang thob cing dam tshig la gnas pa'i
NK040(thi)059:7: rnal 'byor pas zab don gcod kyi sgo nas sbyin
NK040(thi)059:9: zla ba mar ngo dus tshod 'phrod sbyor ngan pa'i dus su /
NK040(thi)059:10: gdug pa'i sa sna gsum gyi steg bu dug khrag
NK040(thi)059:11: gis byug pa mda' gang gi khar ma tam gi
NK040(thi)059:12: khog par gru gsum bang rim sum ldan /
NK040(thi)059:13: kha khyer la ral gris mtshan pa mi ris bskor
NK040(thi)059:14: ba'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab bzhi mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i
NK040(thi)059:15: lha gnas tshom bu dang bcas pa bris /
NK040(thi)059:16: steng du skyer pa sogs dug shing gru gsum du
NK040(thi)059:17: brtsig tshil chen gyis sbag pa'i mar me dbus su
NK040(thi)059:18: bzhag / g.yas ngos su me srog 'dzin pa'i rdzas
NK040(thi)059:19: yam shing gru gsum pa sor bcu gnyis pa tshil
NK040(thi)059:20: zhun gyis byug pa rtsa ba'i rdzas gnod byed kyi
NK040(thi)059:21: bzhag / ling+ga grangs ldan / drag po'i rdzas sha
NK040(thi)059:22: sna bag phye dang bsres pa'i rdzas ril bu ming
NK040(thi)059:23: bzhag / ling+ga grangs ldan / rus can / gnad
NK040(thi)059:24: kyi rdzas sbal sbrul nywa phyis sogs kyi sha dug
NK040(thi)059:26: gsod pa'i rdzas zangs lcags rdo'i phye ma /
NK040(thi)059:27: myos pa'i rdzas dmar nag dme mnol gyi khrag sbyar ba /
NK040(thi)059:28: tsha ba'i rdzas til dang yungs dkar lce tsha dbyi mo srub ka gsum /
NK040(thi)059:29: de ltar rdzas bdun po lcags sam thod pa'i snod du gral rim gyis bkod /
NK040(thi)059:30: g.yon ngos su chu gnyis nyer spyod /
NK040(thi)059:31: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtor ma sman rag dang bcas pa bshams /
NK040(thi)059:32: mdun du las bum rdo dril d+aa ma ru /
NK040(thi)059:33: dgong blug me tog sogs mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad tshang bar byas la /
NK040(thi)059:34: bdag nyid skyabs sems nas bzung tshogs lhag ma'i bar btang /
NK040(thi)059:35: rgyu dus kyi kun slong snying rje bskyed cing /
NK040(thi)059:36: skabs 'dir kun slong zhe sdang drag po'i tshul du dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i chas su zhugs nas /
NK040(thi)059:37: kha lhor phyogs pa'i gdan la 'khod /
NK040(thi)059:38: las bum du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed ste mchod
NK040(thi)059:39: bstod bzlas pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod rdzas bsang
NK040(thi)059:40: sbyang / stong pa'i ngang las a las byung ba'i
NK040(thi)059:41: ye shes kyi ka p+aa la stong gsum dang mnyam
NK040(thi)059:42: pa'i nang du n+ri dang tri las dgra bgegs sha
NK040(thi)059:43: khrag rus gsum phung khams skye mched /
NK040(thi)059:44: de las byung ba'i mchod rdzas rnams ngo bo ye
NK040(thi)059:45: shes kyis bdud rtsi'i rnam pa so so'i mtshan nyid
NK040(thi)059:46: yongs su rdzogs pa'i nam mkha' gang bar bsam la
NK040(thi)059:49: kro ti k+aa li ha ri ni sa n+ri tri ma ra ya dza dza /
NK040(thi)059:50: lan gsum gyis bsreg rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab bo //
NK040(thi)059:51: de nas dem mgar sogs kyis me sbar la /
NK040(thi)059:53: sngon gyi bskal pa'i dang po la //
NK040(thi)059:54: bcom ldan rgyal ba rigs lnga yi //
NK040(thi)059:55: thugs ka'i 'od kyi gong bu nas //
NK040(thi)059:57: ye shes lnga yi me 'bar ba'i //
NK040(thi)059:58: dug lnga nyon mongs gtan nas bsregs //
NK040(thi)059:59: ye shes lnga ru lhun gyis grub //
NK040(thi)059:60: ag+ne ye ha bya ka bya dzahganoda byed ma ra ya dz+wa la ram /
NK040(thi)059:61: zhes rlung g.yab dang bcas pas me spar /
NK040(thi)059:63: zhes mar nag blug gzar bdun gyis gso /
NK040(thi)059:65: stong pa'i ngang las h'u las drag po'i thab khung nag po gru gsum bang rim sum ldan /
NK040(thi)059:66: rgya khyon chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i nang du
NK040(thi)059:67: ra skyes kham pa'i steng du rang nyid kyi thugs
NK040(thi)059:68: ka nas 'phros pa'i ram yig yongs su gyur pa
NK040(thi)059:69: las drag po'i me lha mthing nag khro gtum 'jig
NK040(thi)059:70: pa'i nyams can / zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
NK040(thi)059:71: g.yas gnyis rdo rje dang bgrang phreng /
NK040(thi)059:72: g.yon gnyis dbyug pa dang g+han+d+he bsnams pa /
NK040(thi)059:73: me 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs par gyur /
NK040(thi)059:74: rang gi thugs ka nas dzahmh'u bam ho bzhi 'phros
NK040(thi)059:75: pas ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs par gyur
NK040(thi)059:77: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK040(thi)059:78: tshur gshegs me lha drang srong che //
NK040(thi)059:79: rang gi dam tshig tshul bzhin du //
NK040(thi)059:81: ag+ne ye de ba ri shi ga na dza h'u
NK040(thi)059:82: bam hoh dam tshig pa dang gnyis su med par
NK040(thi)059:84: gzi brjid chen po me yi lha //
NK040(thi)059:85: 'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrub cing //
NK040(thi)059:86: thugs rjes sems can don mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)059:87: 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
NK040(thi)059:88: ag+ne ye de ba ri shi ga na sarba sa ma ya tish+thana tu /
NK040(thi)059:91: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /
NK040(thi)059:92: zhi rgyas dbang drag sna tshogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)059:93: phrin las kun gyi dpang po mdzod //
NK040(thi)059:94: ting nge 'dzin lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK040(thi)059:95: ag+ne a la la pra tits+tsha ho /
NK040(thi)059:98: ye shes me yi dkyil 'khor du //
NK040(thi)059:99: me lha drang srong 'khor bcas la //
NK040(thi)059:101: phrin las rnam bzhi sgrub tu gsol //
NK040(thi)059:102: ag+ne ye de ba sa pa ri wa ra ar+g+ham sogs nas /
NK040(thi)059:104: pany+tsa karma gu na a mri ta rak+ta ba ling+ta pu tsa kha hih zhes mchod /
NK040(thi)059:106: 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mchog gi sras //
NK040(thi)059:107: lo ka'i rgyal po chen por mnga' gsol lo //
NK040(thi)059:108: shes rab mchog gi nyon mongs thams cad bsreg /
NK040(thi)059:109: 'jig rten me lha mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)059:111: me lha'i ljags rdo rje rtse gcig par ram dang
NK040(thi)059:112: dgangs blug gi khar h'u mthing nag 'bar ba res
NK040(thi)059:113: mtshan par gyur / ag+ne ye de bya de bya
NK040(thi)059:114: b+hi shud+d+he ma h+aa sh+r+ai ha bya ka bya ba
NK040(thi)059:115: ha na ya bdag cag dpon slob rgyu sbyor 'khor
NK040(thi)059:116: dang bcas pa rnams la gnod cing 'tshe bar byed
NK040(thi)059:117: pa'i 'gal rkyen bar chad mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams
NK040(thi)059:119: ces lan gsum gyis phul la /
NK040(thi)059:121: rig pa'i rgyal po drang srong me lha khyod kyis
NK040(thi)059:122: las thams cad byed pa'i bsreg rdzas lha yi zhal
NK040(thi)059:123: du bstab pa dang me nyid ye shes kyi mer
NK040(thi)059:124: mdzad nas bdag gi phrin las ma lus par mdzad
NK040(thi)059:125: du gsol / zhes brjod nas yam shing la /
NK040(thi)059:126: ag+ne ye dz+wa la bdag cag dpon slob 'khor dang
NK040(thi)059:127: bcas pa rnams la gnod cing 'tshe bar byed pa'i
NK040(thi)059:128: 'gal rkyen bar chad mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad
NK040(thi)059:133: snga ma ltar rdzas gzhan rnams la /
NK040(thi)059:134: ag+ne ye kro ta ye dgra bgegs gnod byed 'byung
NK040(thi)059:135: po m+aa ra ya dz+wa la ram h'u phatah ces
NK040(thi)059:136: rtsa ba'i rdzas nas tsha ba'i rdzas kyi bar nyer
NK040(thi)059:137: gcig sogs skabs dang sbyar te 'bul /
NK040(thi)059:138: bstod pa sngar ltar byas la 'dod don gsol /
NK040(thi)059:139: de nas 'das pa'i me lha mchod pa ni /
NK040(thi)059:140: dam tshig gi me lha'i lto ba yangs shing rgya
NK040(thi)059:141: che ba'i nang du zhing khams rnam par dag pa
NK040(thi)059:142: o rgyan rang byung gi dur khrod ces sogs nas
NK040(thi)059:143: / ma yum chen sku lnga lhun grub ma la phyag 'tshal bstod /
NK040(thi)059:144: zhes pa'i bar las byang bzhin bya'o //
NK040(thi)059:146: lha tshogs rnams sku mdog mthing nag char sprin ltar
NK040(thi)059:147: gnag cing bzod par dka' ba'i gzi byin can drag
NK040(thi)059:148: po'i bsreg bya za ba'i las la rngam par bsam
NK040(thi)059:150: ye shes lha tshogs rnams kyi ljags rdo rje rtse
NK040(thi)059:151: gcig ram dang dgangs blug gi khar h'u mthing nag
NK040(thi)059:153: zhes pa'i bar g.yon bskor bzhin /
NK040(thi)059:155: badz+ra d+aak+ki ni kro ti ka li ha ri ni
NK040(thi)059:156: sa h'u phatah lan bdun gyis dgangs gzar bkang nas
NK040(thi)059:157: / ag+ne ye de bya ma h+aa sh+ri ha bya
NK040(thi)059:158: ka bya ba ha na ye dgra bgegs gnod byed
NK040(thi)059:160: ces pa'i bar 'jig rten pa'i skabs bzhin no //
NK040(thi)059:163: ma yum chen thugs las sprul pa'i sras /
NK040(thi)059:164: zhes pa nas bzung bstab pa'i bar btang /
NK040(thi)059:167: gdub rtsub drag po'i hom khung du //
NK040(thi)059:168: khros ma nag mo'i lha tshogs la //
NK040(thi)059:169: sdang dgra gnod byed bgegs tshogs kyi //
NK040(thi)059:170: phyi yi phung khams skye mched 'bul //
NK040(thi)059:171: nang gi bla tshe srog dbug 'bul //
NK040(thi)059:172: kha rje dbang thang rlung rta 'bul //
NK040(thi)059:173: bzhes shig rol cig kha ram kha hi //
NK040(thi)059:174: gnod byed dam sri las ngan 'di //
NK040(thi)059:175: khros ma nag mo'i zhal du bstabs //
NK040(thi)059:176: rigs bzhi'i mkha' 'gro'i zhal du bstabs //
NK040(thi)059:177: 'khor tshogs d+aak+ka'i bka' srung dam can bzhes shig rol cig kha ram kha hi //
NK040(thi)059:178: 'khor bcas dgyes shing tshim gyur nas //
NK040(thi)059:179: dgra bgegs brlag pa'i phrin las mdzod //
NK040(thi)059:180: dzah srid pa'i btson khang drag po'i e //
NK040(thi)059:181: bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong //
NK040(thi)059:182: gdug pa'i yam shing mar nag tshil //
NK040(thi)059:183: dmigs pa'i gzugs rten drag po'i rdzas //
NK040(thi)059:184: gnad 'bebs myos byed gsod pa'i mtshon //
NK040(thi)059:185: tsha ba'i nad bskyed rdzas rgod rnams //
NK040(thi)059:186: bsregs pas gnod byed dam sri'i tshogs //
NK040(thi)059:187: lus ngag rdul du bsreg nas kyang //
NK040(thi)059:188: rjes shul lhag ma med par mdzod //
NK040(thi)059:189: gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni kro ti ka li rtsa sngags mthar /
NK040(thi)059:190: gnod byed dgra bgegs 'byung po ag+ne ye dz+wa la ram kha hi /
NK040(thi)059:191: ces me srog 'dzin pa'i rdzas nas tsha ba'i rdzas
NK040(thi)059:192: kyi bar sngags bstun brgya rtsa'am nyer gcig sogs skabs
NK040(thi)059:194: de nas me'i 'khrul 'khor byed na thog mar khros ma'i 'bum bskul byed pa ni /
NK040(thi)059:195: ma shar na bzhugs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma /
NK040(thi)059:197: phatah de nas me mchod dang ham mchod gang rung brgyab /
NK040(thi)059:198: de mthar byon zan ji lta ba bzhin gshegs skyems 'bul /
NK040(thi)059:199: slar yang phyi nang gi nyer spyod sman rag gtor ma dang bcas pas mchod cing /
NK040(thi)059:200: badz+ra tam+bu la ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)059:202: badz+ra wa tra ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)059:204: bstod pa las byang bzhin bya /
NK040(thi)059:207: bdud 'dul khros ma nag mo'i lha tshogs bka' srung
NK040(thi)059:208: dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas pa khyed rnams
NK040(thi)059:209: phrin las su bcol ba'i mdo ni rnal 'byor pa
NK040(thi)059:210: bdag cag dpon slob yon mchod 'khor dang bcas pa
NK040(thi)059:211: rnams kyi sngon gyi las dang 'phral gyi rkyen las
NK040(thi)059:212: gyur pa'i gnod byed dgra bgegs 'byung po thams cad
NK040(thi)059:213: kyi gdug rtsub bsam sbyor ngan pa thams cad zhi
NK040(thi)059:214: bar mdzod cig / zhi rgyas dbang drag gi phrin las rnam pa bzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang /
NK040(thi)059:215: khyad par dgra yi zhing du gyur pa'i dgra bgegs
NK040(thi)059:216: gnod byed gdug pa can thal ba'i rdul phran bzhin
NK040(thi)059:217: du brlag pa'i phrin las mdzod cig /
NK040(thi)059:219: yi ge brgya pas lhag chad kha bskang /
NK040(thi)059:220: rje btsun mkha' 'gro'i sogs kyis bzod gsol bya //
NK040(thi)059:221: khyed kyi sems can sogs nas /
NK040(thi)059:222: badz+ra muh ye shes pa rang gnas su gshegs /
NK040(thi)059:223: dam tshig pa bdag la bstim nas /
NK040(thi)059:224: slar yang 'jig rten pa'i me lha'i btang rag bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)059:225: ag+ne ye de ba sa pa ri wa ra ar+g+ham /
NK040(thi)059:226: nas shap+da'i bar dang bsreg rdzas bdun re sngar bzhin
NK040(thi)059:227: gshegs skyems byon zan gong ltar 'bul 'dod don gsol
NK040(thi)059:231: ag+ne ye de ba sa pa ri wa ra ma h+aa pa ling+ta kha hi /
NK040(thi)059:232: lan gsum gyis 'bul la 'dod don gsol ba ni /
NK040(thi)059:233: mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di zhes la //
NK040(thi)059:235: slar yang mchod cing bstod la nongs pa bshags pa ni /
NK040(thi)059:236: bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don //
NK040(thi)059:237: byin za khyed kyi sgrub kyis gshegs //
NK040(thi)059:238: ji bzhin dus su tshur byon la //
NK040(thi)059:239: bdag gis 'dod pa thams cad bsgrub //
NK040(thi)059:240: badz+ra muh ye shes pa rang gnas su gshegs //
NK040(thi)059:241: dam tshig pa me 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur //
NK040(thi)059:243: shis brjod dang bsngo smon bya /
NK040(thi)059:244: me dug khrag gis gzhil la bro brdung bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)059:246: bro 'di gang dang gang gi bro //
NK040(thi)059:247: bro 'di pha brgyud dpa' bo'i bro //
NK040(thi)059:248: pha rgyud dpa' bo'i bro brdung bas //
NK040(thi)059:249: phyi stong nyid ngang du zings se zing //
NK040(thi)059:250: bar mnyam pa nyid du phri li li //
NK040(thi)059:251: nang ye shes ngang du ya la la //
NK040(thi)059:252: gdon 'dre gdon mgo la chems se chem //
NK040(thi)059:254: bro 'di gang dang gang gi bro 'di ma rgyud dpa' mo'i bro //
NK040(thi)059:257: bro 'di gang dang bro 'di rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bro //
NK040(thi)059:260: bro 'di gang dang bro 'di rin chen rin chen mkha' 'gro'i h'u /
NK040(thi)059:261: bro 'di gang dang bro 'di pad+ma pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i sogs /
NK040(thi)059:263: bro 'di gang bro 'di las kyi mkha' las kyi mkha' sogs /
NK040(thi)059:265: bro 'di gang dang bro 'di sangs rgyas sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i bro brdung pas //
NK040(thi)059:267: lam +aahlam h'u lam s+t+wam b+ha ya nan /
NK040(thi)059:268: ces brjod la bsregs thal mnan pa'am /
NK040(thi)059:269: lam rgya gram lam lha 'dre rgyu ba'i gnas su gtor la /
NK040(thi)059:270: las rjes mi mngon par bya'o //
NK040(thi)059:271: zab don gcod kyi bsregs pa'i las mtha' dus mtha'
NK040(thi)059:272: me chen zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung tshig rnams
NK040(thi)059:273: gzhir bzhag ste lag len 'jug bde'i phyir du tshul
NK040(thi)059:274: ldan gyi sbyin bsreg gzhan nas kha bskang ste /
NK040(thi)059:275: dge slong pad+ma chos dbyings kyi 'phral du bris pa'o //
